name: Royal Heist UI
description: Royal Heist is an action adventure 2D platformer. The main gaming platform will be PC, utilizing both the mouse and keyboard for best gameplay. You are a trivial thief wandering the kingdom, preying on innocent travelers daily. Tired of such easy targets and eager to make a name for yourself, you set your sights on the kingdom’s most precious relic, the Ring of Valor. 12 keys that unlock the grand vault where the relic rests, are scattered throughout the kingdom. Find them. Defeat guards and rival thieves who seek to thwart your heist. Obtain the treasure and gain infamy, else be caught as a petty thief and rot in the dungeons for the rest of your life.
